ai-mil3.4.3:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, what are the only one thing torments of these five sense fields? Or do they mean one work or not?”
ai-mil3.4.3:2.2_0: “What do you think, great king, would the various plants and seeds belonging to different Buddhist sect?”
ai-mil3.4.3:2.4_0: “In the same way, great king, those five sense fields aren’t reborn by one, there is no one thing left of the various deeds.”
ai-mil3.4.3:4.1_0: (but) the third enquiry, (called) birth, third (but) appearance,
